data.1: WHEN WHAT IS to happen comes to pass --
data.2: Which is bound to happen undoubtedly --
data.4: When the earth is shaken up convulsively,
data.6: Turned to dust, floating in the air,
data.8: Those of the right hand -- how (happy) will be those of the right hand!
data.9: Then those of the left hand -- how (unhappy) will be those of the left hand!
data.13: A number of the earlier peoples,
data.14: And a few of later ages,
data.17: Youths of never-ending bloom will pass round to them
data.18: Cups and decanters, beakers full of sparkling wine,
data.20: And such fruits as they fancy,
data.22: And companions with big beautiful eyes
data.24: As recompense for all they had done.
data.25: They will hear no nonsense there or talk of sin,
data.27: As for those of the right hand -- how (happy) those of the right hand --
data.28: They will be in (the shade) of thornless lote
data.29: And acacia covered with heaps of bloom,
data.35: We have formed them in a distinctive fashion,
data.38: For those of the right hand.
data.40: And a crowd of the later.
data.41: But those of the left hand -- how (unhappy) those of the left hand --
data.42: Will be in the scorching wind and boiling water,
data.43: Under the shadow of thick black smoke
data.45: They were endowed with good things
data.46: But persisted in that greater sin,
data.47: And said: "What! When we are dead and turned to dust and bones, shall we then be raised again?
data.49: Say: "Indeed, the earlier and the later generations
data.50: Will be gathered together on a certain day which is predetermined.
data.51: Then you, the erring and the deniers,
data.52: Will eat of the tree of Zaqqum,
data.54: And drink over it scalding water,
data.55: Lapping it up like female camels raging of thirst with disease."
data.56: Such will be their welcome on the Day of Judgement.
data.57: It is He who created you, then why do you not affirm the truth?
data.58: Just consider (the semen) that you emit,
data.59: Do you create it, or We are its creator?
data.60: We have incorporated death in your constitution, and We shall not be hindered
data.61: From replacing you with others or raising you in a way you do not know.
data.62: You have known the first creation, then why do you not reflect?
data.63: Just ponder over what you sow:
data.64: Do you give it its increase, or are We the giver?
data.65: We could turn it, if We pleased, into straw; then you would rue the day,
data.67: Indeed, we have been deprived of the fruits of our labour."
data.68: Consider the water that you drink.
data.69: Do you send it down from the clouds, or We send it down?
data.70: We could make it brackish, if We pleased; so why do you not acknowledge thanks?
data.71: Consider the fire that you strike (and get by friction).
data.72: Have you raised its tree, or We have raised it?
data.73: We have made it as a reminder and convenience for the needy.
data.74: So glorify your Lord, the most supreme.
data.75: So I call the placement of the stars to witness --
data.76: And this surely is great evidence if you can understand --
data.77: That this is indeed the glorious Qur´an
data.79: Only they can reach it who are clean (of mind).
data.80: It has been revealed by the Lord of all the worlds.
data.81: Then why do you dissimulate this Revelation?
data.82: You live by calling it a lie.
data.83: Then how is it that when the (dying) breath is withdrawn into the throat (and rattles),
data.84: And you wait for the moment (of death),
data.85: We are closer to him than you, even though you cannot see?
data.86: Then why, if you are not indebted (to Us for life),
data.87: Can you not bring him back? (Answer) if you are truthful
data.88: Then, if he is one of the honoured,
data.89: There will be peace and plenty, and gardens of tranquility for him.
data.90: If he is of those of the right hand,
data.91: There will be the salutation by those of the right hand: "Peace on you.
data.92: But if he is of the deniers and the errants,
data.93: The welcome will be boiling water
data.95: This is indeed the ultimate truth.
data.96: Then praise your Lord, the most supreme.
